name: PowerCenter:Avoid Unmapped between source and source qualifier
description: List of field unmapped in Source Qualifier
output:
This report lists all Mappings and Mapplets with Source Qualifier having unmapped fields.
it provides the following information
Mapping or Mapplet full name, Source Qualifier full name
rationale: For maintainability, avoid unmapped fields in Source Qualifier. In place of removing unused fields in Source Qualifier, prefer to keep them, linked to Source Definition for futur usage. Note that unused fields in Source Qualifier, so that un-propagated to subsequent transformation, are not used for SQL generation.
remediation: Map every field from the Source Defintion to the Source Qualifier
total: Total number of Mappings and Mapplets having source qualifier transformations
